name: note-root
description: Root project orchestrating frontend and backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.build: npm --prefix frontend install --include=dev && npm --prefix backend install --include=dev && npm --prefix frontend run build && npm --prefix backend run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm --prefix backend run lint:fix || npm --prefix frontend run lint:fix

author: Henry Koekemoer
